## SendableLiquity.repayTHUSD() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

**Signature:**

```typescript
repayTHUSD(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of thUSD to repay. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ repayTHUSD: amount })
```
